tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE influencer_content_preferences (
    influencer_id INT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    audience_age_range VARCHAR(20),
    audience_location VARCHAR(50),
    likes_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    audience_id INT,
    influencer_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    interests VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_preferences (
    influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_type VARCHAR(255),
    audience_age_range VARCHAR(50),
    audience_gender VARCHAR(10),
    engagement_rate DECIMAL(5,2) 
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    interests VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE content_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    audience_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT 
);
CREATE TABLE influencers (id INT, name STRING, followers INT, content_preferences STRING)
CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (id INT, age INT, gender STRING, location STRING)
CREATE TABLE influencer_posts (id INT, influencer_id INT, post_text STRING, likes INT, comments INT)
CREATE TABLE audience_interactions (id INT, audience_id INT, post_id INT, like_status BOOL, comment_status BOOL, share_status BOOL)

CREATE TABLE influencers (
  influencer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_name VARCHAR(255),
  influencer_category VARCHAR(100),
  followers_count INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE content_preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id INT,
  preference_name VARCHAR(255),
  preference_category VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES influencers(influencer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
  audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id INT,
  age_group VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES influencers(influencer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE influencer_stats (
  stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id INT,
  total_posts INT,
  engagement_rate FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES influencers(influencer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  influencer_id INT,
  performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
  performance_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES influencers(influencer_id)
);
